entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 7:21 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:21 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
